language_notice_message: The interface language has been set automatically.
exit_message: You can save your session to continue later.
terms_paragraph1: I want you to know something important.
terms_paragraph2: I am your assistant and I do not replace professional veterinary care. My guidance is for information only, to help you better understand your companion.
terms_paragraph3: If their condition worsens, always consult a veterinarian.
privacy_paragraph1: By using me, you confirm that you understand these limits and agree that I may use your data only to better support you.
privacy_paragraph2: If you agree, let's continue together.
animal_question: What animal would you like to ask about?
continue_without_data_title: Do you want to continue without filling in the data?
continue_without_data_message: This information helps me offer you a better experience.
start_description: I help you understand what they feel
continue_message: You can resume your previous session or start a new one.

about.p1: This app helps pet owners observe symptoms and behavior — without replacing veterinary care.
about.p2: It's based on veterinary decision trees and behavioral logic, adapted for everyday users.
about.p3: We don’t give diagnoses. We help you ask the right questions and seek help in time.
about.signature: Created with love for animals and attention to humans.

symptomSelector.title: What have you noticed in your pet?
symptomSelector.hint: Select up to 3 main symptoms you have observed

chat.ask_confirmation: Please confirm if this is correct or add more details
chat.invite: Can you help me understand what this could mean?

onboarding_1_subtitle: The app helps you notice important symptoms and calmly prepare for a visit to the vet.
onboarding_2_subtitle: You choose your pet and the symptoms, and I turn your observations into clear language — without diagnoses or scary terms.
onboarding_3_subtitle: Each consultation is saved in the “Summary” section, so you can return to the chat and continue from where you left off.
onboarding_4_title: A cheat sheet for the clinic
onboarding_4_subtitle: You can turn the dialogue into a neat PDF summary of your pet’s history and take it to the clinic, so the vet immediately sees the full picture.

summary.empty_subtitle: Start a new chat and save it when you finish – it will show up in this list.

settings.remind_hint: We'll set a reminder to check the pet later today.
settings.max_symptoms_hint: Choose how many symptoms can be selected (3 or 5).
settings.clear_hint: This will remove saved sessions and cached data.
settings.text_size_hint: Increase app text size (without changing system size).
settings.clear_data_message: All saved sessions and cache will be removed. Continue?
settings.clear_done_message: All saved data has been removed.
